comment: Al Jazeera is anti-Israel, anti-America, and downright hateful to the Jewish people.: Americans deserve to know if it is also acting as a foreign agent for the Qatari regime.
amr:
# ::snt Al Jazeera is anti-Israel, anti-America, and downright hateful to the Jewish people.: Americans deserve to know if it is also acting as a foreign agent for the Qatari regime.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (o / oppose-01
                  :ARG0 (p / publication
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Al"
                              :op2 "Jazeera"))
                  :ARG1 (c / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Israel")))
            :op2 (o2 / oppose-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (c2 / country
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "America")))
            :op3 (h / hate-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :mod (r / religious-group
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Jew")))
                  :degree (d / downright)))
      :snt2 (d2 / deserve-01
            :ARG0 (p3 / person
                  :mod (c3 / country
                        :name (n5 / name
                              :op1 "America")))
            :ARG1 (k / know-01
                  :ARG0 p3
                  :ARG1 (t / truth-value
                        :polarity-of (a2 / act-01
                              :ARG0 (ii / it)
                              :ARG1 (a3 / agent
                                    :mod (f / foreign))
                              :beneficiary (r2 / regime
                                    :mod (c4 / country
                                          :name (n6 / name
                                                :op1 "Qatar")))
                              :mod (a4 / also))))))

comment: Hey there, xenophobic slurs are offensive and hurtful and should not be used. Please refrain from these types of comments. Thank you
amr:

      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (o / offend-01

                  :ARG0 s)
